content: Well put, Tony! This, to me is the most interesting field of discovery and potential there is these days! The pendulum is swinging back from the days of cubicles and halogen lighting, however, we’re looking to our screens and to technology as our savior far too much. With that must come the balance of nature. Those individuals, companies and governments that find it will inherit the future. Thanks for your post and thanks to Thrive! Let’s keep spreading the word!!!
